General.Name: Archidply Decor Limited
General.Description: Archidply Decor Limited provides decorative and lifestyle interior design products in India and internationally. The company manufactures and trades in wood based products, including decorative laminates and veneers, plywood and block boards, and prelaminated particle boards. It also offers decorative lumber and solid wood flooring products, tabletops, and veneered wall panels, as well as coating services. Archidply Decor Limited was incorporated in 2017 and is based in Bengaluru, India.
